name: gatsby-starter-default
description: A simple starter to get up and developing quickly with Gatsby
author: Kyle Mathews <mathews.kyle@gmail.com>

scripts.test:alt: npm run build:alt && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:9000 cy:run:alt
scripts.test:conventional: npm run build && start-server-and-test serve http://localhost:9000 cy:run:conventional
scripts.cy:run:alt: (is-ci && cypress run --browser chrome --record -s **/alternate*.js) || cypress run --browser chrome -s **/alternate*.js
scripts.cy:run:conventional: (is-ci && cypress run --browser chrome --record -s **/conventional*.js) || cypress run --browser chrome -s **/conventional*.js
